verses.verse: <S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering is a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> if he <S%H7126>offers<s%> it from the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> whether <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>innards,<s%> and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>innards,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3689>them,<s%> which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> on the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> he shall take <S%H5493>away.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H6086>offering,<s%> which is on the wood that is on the <S%H784>fire:<s%> it is an offering made by <S%H784>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is from the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>
If he <S%H7126>offers<s%> a <S%H3775>lamb<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> its <S%H2459>fat,<s%> the <S%H8549>entire<s%> <S%H451>tail<s%> <S%H5493>fat,<s%> he shall take away <S%H5980>close<s%> to the <S%H6096>backbone;<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3689>them,<s%> which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> on the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> he shall take <S%H5493>away.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering is a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on its <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> from it as his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>innards,<s%> and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>innards,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3689>them,<s%> which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> on the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> he shall take <S%H5493>away.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s.

<S%H5769><s%>"'It shall be a perpetual <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings,<s%> that you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> neither <S%H2459>fat<s%> nor <S%H1818>blood.<s%>'"
